name: Near Death Experience (itch)
description:
The first level will be a little bit difficult! Is a riddle: The pieces of the character's life are the photos, and the angel's scream is the strange sound that you'll hear during the level. Only when there is the sound, the photos will appear!

Vote this game on Greenlight!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=899562173

Listen to Near Death Experience main theme here! https://soundcloud.com/dcwmusic/empty-rooms-near-d...

The other soundtracks are in the same channel!
